SELECT P.pkid AS projectId, P.project_name AS projectName, pp.area_code AS areaCode, pp.town_code AS townCode, ac1.area_name AS areaName, ac2.area_name AS townName, p.person_name AS personName, P.project_kind AS projectKind, P.output_person_name AS outputPersonName, DATE_FORMAT(P.update_date,'%Y-%m-%d') AS updateDateStr, pa.show_preice AS showPreice
FROM project P LEFT JOIN project_person pp ON pp.project_id = P.pkid LEFT JOIN project_around pa ON pa.project_id = P.pkid LEFT JOIN area_code ac1 ON pp.area_code = ac1.code LEFT JOIN area_code ac2 ON pp.town_code = ac2.code
P.project_status = 4
